```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(biogas)
```

Create stoichiometry matrix


```{r}
s <- predBg(subs <- c(carb = 'C6H10O5', protein ='C5H7O2N', lipid = 'C57H104O6'), fs = 0.1, value = 'reactionn')
rownames(s) <- subs
s <- t(s)
s
```

Make a vector of consumption rates.

```{r}
dy <- c(0.1, 0.2, 0.01)
names(dy) <- subs
dy
```

And calculate all derivatives with matrix multiplication--one line of code!

```{r}
s %*% dy
```
